Colours

Example
SE Blue
#00427f
$se-blue
SE Bright Green
#00cc00
$se-bright-green
SE Light Blue
#2980b9
$se-light-blue
SE Dark Green
#03634D
$se-dark-green
SE Orange
#D65811
$se-orange
SE Black
#2F3E44
$se-black
SE Mid Grey
#999999
$se-mid-grey
SE Light Grey
#ecf0f1
$se-light-grey
Headings
#333333
$se-dark-grey
Body Copy
#666666
$se-body-grey
Links
#00427f
$se-blue
Panel Headings
#ffffff
$se-white

Usage notes

The Scottish Enterprise online brand palette must be used at all times. When creating a website or application clours must be specified in hexadecimal formet.
